<Text: Stachys the Apostle:  He seemed to be closely connected to Saint Andrew and Saint Paul.>

2:

Text: Stachys the Apostle:  Eusebius quotes Origen as saying that Andrew had preached in Asia Minor and in Scythia, along the Black Sea as far as the Volga and Kiev, hence he became a patron saint of Romania and Russia.
Triplets:<Stachys the Apostle
4:
--------------------
Text: Stachys the Apostle:  This See would later develop into the Patriarchate of Constantinople, having Apostle Andrew as its Patron Saint.
